tests.name: Check letters classification 200 points
tests.run: curl -vX POST https://functions.yandexcloud.net/d4en1ufd9vthf8hbrioc -d "repo_name=$( cat .repo_name )&result_points=200&max_invalid_letters_count=1000&submit=$( cat letters.csv | perl -pe 's/\n/%0D%0A/g' )" --fail-with-body

tests.name: Check letters classification 300 points
tests.run: curl -vX POST https://functions.yandexcloud.net/d4en1ufd9vthf8hbrioc -d "repo_name=$( cat .repo_name )&result_points=300&max_invalid_letters_count=300&submit=$( cat letters.csv | perl -pe 's/\n/%0D%0A/g' )" --fail-with-body

tests.name: Check letters classification 400 points
tests.run: curl -vX POST https://functions.yandexcloud.net/d4en1ufd9vthf8hbrioc -d "repo_name=$( cat .repo_name )&result_points=400&max_invalid_letters_count=0&submit=$( cat letters.csv | perl -pe 's/\n/%0D%0A/g' )" --fail-with-body

tests.name: feedback
